title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 140.12 - Shipments for experimental and scientific purposes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 140.12 - Shipments for experimental and scientific purposes

State Regulations

Regulated articles may be moved intrastate for experimental
or scientific purposes, on such conditions and under such safeguards as may be
prescribed by the New York State Department of Agriculture and Markets. The
container of articles so moved shall bear, securely attached to the outside
thereof, an identifying tag issued by the New York State Department of

Agriculture and Markets showing compliance with such
conditions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
140.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
